definition: to have no other choice
surname Bie
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
to choose/to pick/to select/to elect
to select/to choose/to pick over/to pick out/to differentiate/to eliminate/also pr. [zhai2]

sentences.english: He had no choice but to comply, allowing the Imperials aboard.
sentences.chinese: 他別無選擇，只能照辦，同意帝國檢查隊登艦。

sentences.english: In an emergency, buyers under duress have no freedom.
sentences.chinese: 在緊急關頭，買家迫不得已別無選擇。

sentences.english: "I'd never mobilized people before, but I had no choice, " says Alger.
sentences.chinese: 我以前從來沒有動員過別人，但我別無選擇。

sentences.english: The USGA gave me no option but to stand up and fight them, and fight them I did.
sentences.chinese: USGA讓我別無選擇，我只有站起來跟他們對抗。

sentences.english: You have no choice but to break away from the illegal organization.
sentences.chinese: 除了擺脫那個非法組織，你別無選擇。

sentences.english: Wipe away tears, we have nothing to do but adamancy.
sentences.chinese: 擦乾眼淚，除了堅強我們別無選擇。

sentences.english: The choice was clear -- abandon them, or his dreams.
sentences.chinese: 似乎是別無選擇了，拋棄他們，或者繼續做白日夢。

sentences.english: I had no option but to agree.
sentences.chinese: 我除了同意以外別無選擇。

sentences.english: Diesel oil looks not so good, but there is no choice.
sentences.chinese: 儘管柴油看起來並不怎麼好，但也別無選擇了。

sentences.english: They have little choice, but it may be a mission impossible.
sentences.chinese: 他們別無選擇，但這或許只是個不可能完成的使命。

sentences.english: I was left with no choice but to fight my way out.
sentences.chinese: 我別無選擇，只能背水一戰。

sentences.english: We had no choice but to wait.
sentences.chinese: 除了等待，我們別無選擇。

sentences.english: No choice to be the next retaining the power of a death Lucia.
sentences.chinese: 在別無選擇的情況下一護得到露琪亞的力量成爲死神。

sentences.english: Yang Zhiyuan besides nonofficeholding Ren Youya the tiger is bought outside have no alternative.
sentences.chinese: 楊致遠除了下臺任由雅虎被收購外別無選擇。

sentences.english: 'We had no choice but to do further research, ' he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，我們別無選擇，只能深入調查。

sentences.english: He had no choice, and turned to see the LCD screen of display.
sentences.chinese: 別無選擇，他回過頭看着顯示器的液晶屏幕。

definition: to no avail/of no use
it will cause no end of trouble (idiom)
to work to no avail (idiom)
open the net on one side (idiom); let the caged bird fly/to give one's opponent a way out/lenient treatment
downhearted/downcast/in despair
many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
to submit to the will of heaven/to resign oneself to fate/to trust to luck
switchboard operator
to force someone to do something
reluctant to part
every hope turns to dust (idiom); completely disheartened
to contend on strong grounds/to argue strongly for what is right
to ask for trouble/to invite difficulties
to shiver
vocal accompaniment in some traditional Chinese operas/to speak in support of/to chime in
deeply worried (idiom); to feel anxious
